ai-anya-e0501n19:1_0: Understanding the four continents (of the Supreme), the Paṭisambhidā later-story, and arrived later.
ai-anya-e0501n19:2_0: Herein, rising in the womb for two months there is a condition for the arising of mentality-materiality in the name and form. It is a condition for name and form.
ai-anya-e0501n19:2_1: Herein, the fourth chapter on name and form is conceived in the fine-material orders of the heart. The mind-made body is the basis for ending, namely, form is the sitter of the heart.
ai-anya-e0501n19:2_2: And it is shared by the three kinds of clear vision that is suitable in the past,
ai-anya-e0501n19:2_3: The conclusion of the supreme conqueror, is finished.
